title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.1 - Free time, definition of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.1 - Free time, definition of

State Regulations
(a) The specified period during which cargo may occupy space assigned to it on
terminal property free of wharf demurrage or terminal storage charges
immediately prior to the loading or subsequent to the discharge of such cargo
on or off the vessel. (b) Free time
on inbound cargo will commence on the day after discharge of cargo is
completed. (c) Free time on outbound
cargo will commence seven days before the day on which vessel
berths. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1244.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
